title: Is it permissible to drive without a drivers license in order to learn how to drive? | Assim Al
transcript: mahdi from bangladesh says he doesn't have a driving license so is it permissible for him to drive on the road to learn the answer if it's this if this is safe and usually most countries allow someone without a driving a driver's license to drive if he's accompanied by someone with a driving a driver's license so that he would supervise so if this is the case yeah there's no problem insha allah providing that you don't endanger yourself or other drivers nila
